  2. ä¿®æ”¹config-overrides.jsæ·»åŠ externalsé…ç½®

    const {
  override,
  addWebpackPlugin,
  addPostcssPlugins,
  addWebpackExternals
} = require('customize-cra')
const WebpackBuildNotifierPlugin = require('webpack-build-notifier')
const WebpackBar = require('webpackbar')

const path = require('path')

module.exports = {
  webpack: override(
    addWebpackPlugin(
      new WebpackBar(),
      new WebpackBuildNotifierPlugin({
        title: 'MISSION SUCCESS!',
        logo: path.resolve('./src/logo.svg'),
        suppressSuccess: true
      })
    ),
    addPostcssPlugins([require('postcss-rtl')()]),
    // æ·»åŠ  externals é…ç½®
    addWebpackExternals({
      BMapGL: 'BMapGL'
    })
  )
}

    import React, { useRef, useEffect } from 'react'
import BMapGL from 'BMapGL'
import { Card } from 'reactstrap'

const BMapDemo = () => {
  const bMapContainerRef = useRef(null)

  useEffect(() => {
    // åˆ›å»º BMapGL å®ä¾‹
    const bMap = new BMapGL.Map(bMapContainerRef.current)
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹åæ ‡
    const point = new BMapGL.Point(116.404, 39.915)
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–åœ°å›¾ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹åæ ‡å’Œåœ°å›¾çº§åˆ«
    bMap.centerAndZoom(point, 12)
    bMap.enableScrollWheelZoom(true)
  }, [])

  return (
    <Card
      style={{
        width: '100%',
        height: '300px'
      }}>
      <div
        ref={bMapContainerRef}
        style={{
          width: '100%',
          height: '100%'
        }}
      />
    </Card>
  )
}
